page.title: 07ECOLOGY LAND USE & ABUSE
page.content:
Farmers and landowners cover the whole spectrum of conservation conciousness. At the top end we have the owner of Linstead farm who uses modern machinery and technology while conserving and developing the countrysides's natural features. Trees and hedges have been retained and planted, ponds created and areas left uncultivated to maintain an ecological balance.At the other end we have "prairie" type farming. Hedges and trees have been uprooted and ditches
filled in,with apparent disregard for anything but recouping the high purchase price of the land.A recent project is the creation of an organically farmed market garden, whose owner is producing vegetables without the aid of artificial fertiliserd or sprays.
